get.description: Retrieves basic information about the Safe Client Gateway application including version and build details.

post.description: Creates a new account for the authenticated user. The account is associated with the signer address from the authentication payload.

requestBody.description: Account creation data including name and other optional settings

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

403.description: Access forbidden - insufficient permissions

get.description: Retrieves all available account data types that can be used when configuring account data settings.

200.description: List of available account data types

get.description: Retrieves data settings for a specific account address. Returns the configured data types and their settings for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The account address (0x prefixed hex string)

200.description: List of account data settings for the specified address

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

put.description: Creates or updates data settings for a specific account address. This endpoint allows configuring which data types are enabled for the account.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The account address (0x prefixed hex string)

requestBody.description: Data settings to create or update for the account

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

get.description: Retrieves account information for a specific address. The account must belong to the authenticated user.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The account address (0x prefixed hex string)

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

delete.description: Deletes an account and all its associated data for the specified address. The account must belong to the authenticated user.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The account address to delete (0x prefixed hex string)

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

get.description: Generates and returns a unique nonce that must be signed by the client for authentication. The nonce is used in the Sign-In with Ethereum (SiWE) message.

post.description: Verifies a signed Sign-In with Ethereum (SiWE) message and nonce. On successful verification, sets an HTTP-only JWT cookie for subsequent authenticated requests.

requestBody.description: Sign-In with Ethereum message and signature for verification

200.description: Authentication successful. JWT token set as HTTP-only cookie named "access_token".

400.description: Invalid SiWE message format or signature verification failed

401.description: Authentication failed - invalid or expired nonce

post.description: Logs out the authenticated user by clearing the JWT authentication cookie. This invalidates the current session.

200.description: Logout successful. Authentication cookie cleared and set to expire.

get.description: Retrieves token balances for a Safe on a specific chain, converted to the specified fiat currency. Includes native tokens, ERC-20 tokens, and their current market values.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: fiatCode
parameters.description: Fiat currency code for balance conversion (e.g., USD, EUR)

parameters.name: trusted
parameters.description: If true, only returns balances for trusted tokens

parameters.name: exclude_spam
parameters.description: If true, excludes spam tokens from results

200.description: Safe balances retrieved successfully with fiat conversions

get.description: Retrieves a list of all supported fiat currency codes that can be used for balance conversions.

200.description: List of supported fiat currency codes (e.g., ["USD", "EUR", "GBP"])

parameters.name: refresh
parameters.description: Cache busting parameter. Set to true to invalidate cache and fetch fresh data from Zerion

get.description: Retrieves the complete portfolio for an address including token balances and app positions across all supported chains.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Wallet address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: fiatCode
parameters.description: Fiat currency code for balance conversion (e.g., USD, EUR)

parameters.name: chainIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of chain IDs to filter by. If omitted, returns data for all chains.

parameters.name: trusted
parameters.description: If true, only returns trusted tokens

parameters.name: excludeDust
parameters.description: If true, filters out dust positions (balance < $0.001 USD)

delete.description: Clears the cached portfolio data for a specific address

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Wallet address (0x prefixed hex string)

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all blockchain networks supported by the Safe infrastructure, including their configuration and capabilities.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific blockchain network, including its configuration, features, and Safe-specific settings.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID of the blockchain network

get.description: Retrieves general information about a blockchain network, including network details and statistics.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID of the blockchain network

get.description: Retrieves backbone infrastructure information for a specific chain, including API endpoints and service configurations.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID of the blockchain network

get.description: Retrieves information about Safe master copy contracts deployed on the specified chain, including their addresses and versions.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID of the blockchain network

200.description: List of Safe master copy contracts

get.description: Retrieves the current indexing status for a blockchain network, including the latest indexed block and synchronization state.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID of the blockchain network

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a smart contract deployed on the specified chain, including ABI, source code verification status, and contract metadata.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the contract is deployed

parameters.name: contractAddress
parameters.description: Contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

requestBody.description: Transaction export request

404.description: CSV export not found

post.description: Decodes raw transaction data into human-readable format using contract ABIs. This helps understand what functions are being called and with what parameters.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the transaction will be executed

requestBody.description: Transaction data to decode, including contract address and data payload

200.description: Transaction data decoded successfully with method name, parameters, and values

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of delegates for a specific chain. This endpoint is deprecated, please use the v2 version instead.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where delegates are registered

parameters.name: safe
parameters.description: Filter by Safe address

parameters.name: delegate
parameters.description: Filter by delegate address

parameters.name: delegator
parameters.description: Filter by delegator address

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Filter by delegate label

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results

200.description: Paginated list of delegates retrieved successfully

post.description: Creates a new delegate for a specific chain. This endpoint is deprecated, please use the v2 version instead.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the delegate will be registered

requestBody.description: Delegate creation data including Safe address, delegate address, and signature

delete.description: Deletes a delegate for a specific chain and address. This endpoint is deprecated, please use the v2 version instead.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the delegate is registered

parameters.name: delegateAddress
parameters.description: Delegate address to delete (0x prefixed hex string)

requestBody.description: Signature proving authorization to delete the delegate

400.description: Invalid signature or unauthorized deletion attempt

delete.description: Removes a delegate from a specific Safe. This endpoint is deprecated, please use the v2 version instead.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: delegateAddress
parameters.description: Delegate address to remove (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

requestBody.description: Signature proving authorization to remove the delegate

400.description: Invalid signature or unauthorized removal attempt

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of delegates for a specific chain with optional filtering by Safe, delegate, delegator, or label.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where delegates are registered

parameters.name: safe
parameters.description: Filter by Safe address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: delegate
parameters.description: Filter by delegate address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: delegator
parameters.description: Filter by delegator address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Filter by delegate label or name

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results

200.description: Paginated list of delegates retrieved successfully

post.description: Creates a new delegate relationship between a Safe and a delegate address. Requires proper authorization signature.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the delegate will be registered

requestBody.description: Delegate creation data including Safe address, delegate address, label, and authorization signature

400.description: Invalid delegate data, signature, or unauthorized creation attempt

delete.description: Removes a delegate relationship for a specific delegate address. Requires proper authorization signature.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the delegate is registered

parameters.name: delegateAddress
parameters.description: Delegate address to remove (0x prefixed hex string)

requestBody.description: Signature and data proving authorization to delete the delegate

400.description: Invalid signature or unauthorized deletion attempt

post.description: Estimates the gas cost for executing a multisig transaction on a Safe. Provides both the recommended gas limit and the current gas price for accurate cost calculation.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

requestBody.description: Transaction details for gas estimation including recipient, value, and data

200.description: Gas estimation calculated successfully with recommended values

400.description: Invalid transaction parameters or estimation failed

post.description: Registers or updates a device to receive push notifications for Safe events. Creates subscriptions for specified Safes and notification types.

requestBody.description: Device and subscription data including device token, Safe addresses, and notification preferences

201.description: Device registered successfully with returned device UUID

deviceUuid.description: Generated UUID for the registered device

400.description: Invalid device data or subscription configuration

get.description: Retrieves the notification types that a device is subscribed to for a specific Safe.

parameters.name: deviceUuid
parameters.description: Device UUID

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

200.description: List of notification types the device is subscribed to for this Safe

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

404.description: Device, Safe, or subscription not found

delete.description: Removes all notification subscriptions for a specific Safe on a device.

parameters.name: deviceUuid
parameters.description: Device UUID

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

404.description: Device, Safe, or subscription not found

delete.description: Delete all subscriptions of a Safe on a device. This will delete all subscriptions of a Safe on a device for all chains passed in the request body.

404.description: No subscription was found

delete.summary: Delete all subscriptions of a device

delete.description: Removes a device and all its notification subscriptions from the system.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID (kept for backward compatibility)

parameters.name: deviceUuid
parameters.description: Device UUID to delete

404.description: Device not found

get.description: Retrieves a specific message by its hash, including signatures, confirmations, and message content.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the message was created

parameters.name: messageHash
parameters.description: Message hash (0x prefixed hex string)

404.description: Message not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of messages for a specific Safe, including both pending and confirmed messages with date labels.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results

200.description: Paginated list of messages for the Safe

404.description: Safe not found on the specified chain

post.description: Creates a new message for a Safe. The message must be properly formatted and signed according to EIP-191 or EIP-712 standards.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

requestBody.description: Message data including content and signature

post.description: Adds a signature to an existing message. Multiple Safe owners can sign the same message to reach consensus.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the message was created

parameters.name: messageHash
parameters.description: Message hash (0x prefixed hex string)

requestBody.description: Signature data to add to the message

400.description: Invalid signature or signer not authorized

404.description: Message not found

post.description: Registers a device to receive push notifications for Safe events. This endpoint is deprecated, please use the v2 version instead.

requestBody.description: Device registration data including device token, UUID, and Safe registrations with signatures

400.description: Invalid device data, expired timestamp, or invalid signature

delete.description: Removes a device from receiving notifications. This endpoint is deprecated, please use the v2 version instead.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID (kept for backward compatibility)

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: Device UUID to unregister

delete.description: Removes a specific Safe from receiving notifications on a device. This endpoint is deprecated, please use the v2 version instead.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: Device UUID

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

204.description: Safe unregistered from device notifications successfully

get.description: Retrieves the authenticated user information along with all associated wallet addresses.

200.description: User information with associated wallets retrieved successfully

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

404.description: User not found - the authenticated wallet is not associated with any user

delete.description: Deletes the authenticated user and all associated data including wallets and account information.

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

404.description: User not found - the authenticated wallet is not associated with any user

post.description: Creates a new user account associated with the authenticated wallet address.

201.description: User created successfully with wallet association

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

409.description: Wallet already exists - this wallet is already associated with a user

post.description: Associates an additional wallet address with the authenticated user account using Sign-In with Ethereum (SiWE) verification.

requestBody.description: Sign-In with Ethereum message and signature for the wallet to add

401.description: Authentication required or invalid SiWE message/signature

404.description: User not found - the authenticated wallet is not associated with any user

409.description: Wallet already exists - this wallet is already associated with a user

delete.description: Removes a wallet address from the authenticated user account. Cannot remove the currently authenticated wallet.

parameters.name: walletAddress
parameters.description: Wallet address to remove (0x prefixed hex string)

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

404.description: User or specified wallet not found

409.description: Cannot remove the current wallet - use a different wallet to authenticate

get.description: Retrieves all address book entries for a specific space. Address books help organize and label frequently used addresses.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space ID to get address book for

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

403.description: Access forbidden - user is not a member of this space

404.description: User, member, or space not found

put.description: Creates or updates address book entries for a space. This allows adding labels and organizing frequently used addresses.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space ID to update address book for

requestBody.description: Address book items to create or update, including addresses and their labels

400.description: Address book items limit exceeded or invalid data provided

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

403.description: Access forbidden - user is not authorized to modify this address book

404.description: User, member, or space not found

delete.description: Removes a specific address from the space address book by its address.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space ID containing the address book

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address to remove from the address book (0x prefixed hex string)

403.description: Access forbidden - user is not authorized to modify this address book

404.description: User, member, space, or address book entry not found

post.description: Creates a new space for the authenticated user. A space is a collaborative workspace where users can manage multiple Safes together.

requestBody.description: Space creation data including the name of the space

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

403.description: Forbidden resource - user lacks permission to create spaces

404.description: User not found - the authenticated wallet is not associated with any user

get.description: Retrieves all spaces that the authenticated user is a member of or has been invited to.

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

403.description: Forbidden resource - user lacks permission to view spaces

404.description: User not found - the authenticated wallet is not associated with any user

post.description: Creates a new space and automatically creates a user account if one does not exist for the authenticated wallet.

requestBody.description: Space creation data including the name of the space

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

403.description: Forbidden resource - user lacks permission to create spaces

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific space. The user must be a member of or invited to the space.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Space ID

401.description: Authentication required - valid JWT token must be provided

403.description: Forbidden resource - user is not a member of this space

404.description: Space not found or user not found

patch.description: Updates space information such as name. Only space admins can update space details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Space ID to update

requestBody.description: Space update data including new name or other properties

401.description: Authentication required or user unauthorized to update this space

403.description: Forbidden resource - user is not an admin of this space

404.description: User or space not found

delete.description: Deletes a space and all its associated data. Only space admins can delete spaces.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Space ID to delete

401.description: Authentication required or user unauthorized to delete this space

403.description: Forbidden resource - user is not an admin of this space

404.description: User or space not found

post.description: Adds one or more Safe addresses to a space. This allows the space members to collectively manage these Safes.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space ID to add Safes to

requestBody.description: List of Safe addresses and their chain information to add to the space

401.description: Authentication required or user unauthorized to modify this space

403.description: Access forbidden - user lacks permission to add Safes to this space

404.description: User or space not found

get.description: Retrieves all Safes associated with a specific space, including their chain information and metadata.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space ID to get Safes for

401.description: Authentication required or user unauthorized to access this space

403.description: Access forbidden - user is not a member of this space

404.description: User or space not found

delete.description: Removes one or more Safe addresses from a space. This stops the space from managing these Safes.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space ID to remove Safes from

requestBody.description: List of Safe addresses and their chain information to remove from the space

401.description: Authentication required or user unauthorized to modify this space

403.description: Access forbidden - user lacks permission to remove Safes from this space

404.description: Space has no Safes, user not found, or specified Safes not found in space

post.description: Invites one or more users to join a space. Only space admins can send invitations.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space ID to invite users to

requestBody.description: List of wallet addresses to invite to the space

401.description: Authentication required or user not admin or member not active

403.description: User not authorized - must be a space admin to invite users

409.description: Too many invites or some users already invited

post.description: Accepts an invitation to join a space. The user must have a pending invitation to the space.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space ID to accept invitation for

requestBody.description: Invitation acceptance data including any required confirmation

200.description: Invitation accepted successfully - user is now a member of the space

403.description: Access forbidden - user is not authorized to accept this invitation

404.description: User, space, or membership invitation not found

409.description: User invitation is not in pending state or already processed

post.description: Declines an invitation to join a space. The user must have a pending invitation to the space.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space ID to decline invitation for

403.description: Access forbidden - user is not authorized to decline this invitation

404.description: User, space, or membership invitation not found

409.description: User invitation is not in pending state or already processed

get.description: Retrieves all members of a space including their roles, status, and membership information.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space ID to get members for

403.description: Access forbidden - user is not authorized to view this space's members

404.description: User or space not found

delete.description: Remove own membership from a space.

401.description: Signer address not provided

403.description: Signer not authorized

404.description: Signer or space not found

patch.description: Updates the role of a space member. Only space admins can change member roles. Cannot remove the last admin from a space.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space ID containing the member

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID of the member to update

requestBody.description: New role information for the member

401.description: User is not active or not an admin of this space

403.description: Access forbidden - user is not authorized to update member roles

404.description: User, space, or member not found

409.description: Cannot remove the last admin from the space

patch.description: Update the alias of the authenticated member in a space. Users can only update their own alias.

403.description: Signer not authorized

404.description: Signer, space or member not found

delete.description: Removes a member from a space. Only space admins can remove other members. Cannot remove the last admin from a space.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space ID to remove member from

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID of the member to remove

401.description: User is not active or not an admin of this space

403.description: Access forbidden - user is not authorized to remove members

404.description: User, space, or member not found

409.description: Cannot remove the last admin from the space

get.description: Retrieves a list of Safe addresses that are owned by the specified address on a specific chain.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID to search for Safes

parameters.name: ownerAddress
parameters.description: Owner address to search Safes for (0x prefixed hex string)

200.description: List of Safes owned by the specified address

get.description: Retrieves Safes owned by an address across all chains. This endpoint is deprecated, please use the chain-specific version instead.

parameters.name: ownerAddress
parameters.description: Owner address to search Safes for (0x prefixed hex string)

200.description: Map of chain IDs to arrays of Safe addresses

get.description: Retrieves all Safes owned by the specified address across all supported chains. Returns a map of chain IDs to arrays of Safe addresses.

parameters.name: ownerAddress
parameters.description: Owner address to search Safes for (0x prefixed hex string)

200.description: Map of chain IDs to arrays of Safe addresses owned by the address

post.description: Relays a Safe transaction using the relay service, which pays for gas fees. The transaction must meet certain criteria and the Safe must have remaining relay quota.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe transaction will be executed

requestBody.description: Transaction data to relay including Safe address, transaction details, and signatures

200.description: Transaction relayed successfully with transaction hash

400.description: Invalid transaction data, unofficial contracts, or unsupported operation

429.description: Relay limit reached for this Safe

get.description: Retrieves the number of remaining relay transactions available for a specific Safe on the given chain.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

get.description: Retrieves a list of Safe Apps available for a specific chain, with optional filtering by client URL or app URL.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID to get Safe Apps for

parameters.name: clientUrl
parameters.description: Filter by client URL to get apps compatible with specific client

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Filter by specific Safe App URL

200.description: List of Safe Apps available for the specified chain

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a Safe including owners, threshold, modules, and current state.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

404.description: Safe not found on the specified chain

get.description: Retrieves the current nonces for a Safe, including the transaction nonce and any queued nonces.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

404.description: Safe not found on the specified chain

get.description: Retrieves an overview of multiple Safes including their balances, transaction counts, and other summary information. Supports cross-chain queries using CAIP-10 address format.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Fiat currency code for balance conversion (e.g., USD, EUR)

parameters.name: safes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Safe addresses in CAIP-10 format (chainId:address)

parameters.name: trusted
parameters.description: If true, only includes trusted tokens in balance calculations

parameters.name: exclude_spam
parameters.description: If true, excludes spam tokens from balance calculations

parameters.name: wallet_address
parameters.description: Optional wallet address to filter Safes where this address is an owner

200.description: Array of Safe overviews with balances and metadata

get.description: Performs real-time security analysis of a recipient address for a specific Safe. Returns analysis results grouped by status group, sorted by severity (CRITICAL first).

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address

parameters.name: recipientAddress
parameters.description: Recipient address to analyze

post.description: Performs combined contract and recipient analysis for a Safe transaction. Returns both analyses grouped by status group for each counterparty.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address

requestBody.description: Transaction data used to analyze all counterparties involved.

200.description: Combined counterparty analysis including recipients and contracts grouped by status group and mapped to an address.

post.description: Performs real-time threat analysis for a Safe transaction.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address

requestBody.description: EIP-712 typed data and wallet information for threat analysis.

200.description: Threat analysis results including threat findings and balance changes.

post.description: Reports a FALSE_POSITIVE or FALSE_NEGATIVE Blockaid transaction scan result for review. Use the request_id from the original scan response to identify the transaction.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address

requestBody.description: Report details including event type, request_id from scan response, and details.

404.description: Safe not targeted.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific transaction by its ID, including execution status, confirmations, and decoded transaction data.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the transaction exists

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Transaction ID (safe transaction hash or multisig transaction ID)

404.description: Transaction not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of multisig transactions for a Safe with optional filtering by execution date, recipient, value, nonce, and execution status.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: execution_date__gte
parameters.description: Filter by execution date greater than or equal to (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: execution_date__lte
parameters.description: Filter by execution date less than or equal to (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter by recipient address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Filter by transaction value in wei

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: Filter by transaction nonce

parameters.name: executed
parameters.description: Filter by execution status (true for executed, false for pending)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results

delete.description: Deletes a pending multisig transaction. Only the proposer or a Safe owner can delete a transaction.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the transaction exists

parameters.name: safeTxHash
parameters.description: Safe transaction hash (0x prefixed hex string)

requestBody.description: Signature proving authorization to delete the transaction

400.description: Invalid signature or unauthorized deletion attempt

404.description: Transaction not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of module transactions for a Safe. Module transactions are executed directly by enabled modules without requiring owner signatures.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter by recipient address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: module
parameters.description: Filter by module address that executed the transaction

parameters.name: transaction_hash
parameters.description: Filter by specific transaction hash

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results

post.description: Adds a confirmation signature to a pending multisig transaction. Once enough confirmations are collected to meet the Safe threshold, the transaction can be executed.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeTxHash
parameters.description: Safe transaction hash (0x prefixed hex string)

requestBody.description: Confirmation signature from a Safe owner proving their approval of the transaction

200.description: Transaction details with updated confirmation status

400.description: Invalid signature or confirmation already exists for this owner

404.description: Transaction not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of incoming transfers to a Safe, including ETH and token transfers with optional filtering by date, value, token, and trust status.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: trusted
parameters.description: Filter by trust status (true for trusted tokens, false for untrusted)

parameters.name: execution_date__gte
parameters.description: Filter by execution date greater than or equal to (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: execution_date__lte
parameters.description: Filter by execution date less than or equal to (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter by recipient address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Filter by transfer value in wei

parameters.name: token_address
parameters.description: Filter by token contract address (0x prefixed hex string for ERC-20 tokens)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results

post.description: Simulates a transaction execution to preview its effects, including gas estimates, balance changes, and potential errors before actually proposing or executing it.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

requestBody.description: Transaction data to preview including recipient, value, data, and operation type

200.description: Transaction preview with simulation results, gas estimates, and potential effects

400.description: Invalid transaction data or simulation failed

404.description: Safe not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of queued (pending) transactions for a Safe that are waiting for execution, ordered by nonce.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: trusted
parameters.description: Filter by trust status (true for trusted transactions, false for untrusted)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of executed transactions for a Safe, including multisig transactions, module transactions, and incoming transfers, ordered by execution date.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

parameters.name: timezone_offset
parameters.description: Deprecated: Timezone offset in milliseconds for date formatting (use timezone parameter instead)

parameters.name: trusted
parameters.description: Filter by trust status (default: true, set to false to include untrusted transactions)

parameters.name: imitation
parameters.description: Include imitation transactions in results (default: true, set to false to exclude)

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: IANA timezone identifier for date formatting (e.g., "America/New_York")

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results

post.description: Proposes a new multisig transaction for a Safe. The transaction will be pending until enough owners sign it to reach the required threshold.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

requestBody.description: Transaction proposal including recipient, value, data, and initial signature

get.description: Retrieves the transaction that created the Safe, including the creation timestamp, creator address, factory used, and setup data.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the Safe is deployed

parameters.name: safeAddress
parameters.description: Safe contract address (0x prefixed hex string)

404.description: Safe not found or creation transaction not available

trusted.description: Whether the token is trusted (spam filter)
Whether the token is trusted (spam filter)
Whether the token is trusted (spam filter)

balance.description: Balance in smallest unit as string integer. Use decimals to convert.

balanceFiat.description: Balance in requested fiat currency. Decimal string without exponent notation or thousand separators.

price.description: Token price in requested fiat currency. Decimal string without exponent notation or thousand separators.

priceChangePercentage1d.description: Price change as decimal (e.g., "-0.0431" for -4.31%). Decimal string without exponent notation.

groupId.description: Group ID for grouping related positions together

receiptTokenAddress.description: Receipt token address (pool address) representing this position. This is the contract address for the position token (LP token, staking receipt, etc.), not the underlying token.

balance.description: Balance in smallest unit as string integer. Use decimals to convert.

balanceFiat.description: Balance in requested fiat currency. Decimal string without exponent notation or thousand separators.

priceChangePercentage1d.description: Price change as decimal (e.g., "-0.0431" for -4.31%). Decimal string without exponent notation.

balanceFiat.description: Total balance in fiat currency across all position groups. Decimal string without exponent notation or thousand separators.

groups.description: Position groups in this app, grouped by position name

totalBalanceFiat.description: Total balance in fiat currency across all tokens and positions. Decimal string without exponent notation or thousand separators.

totalTokenBalanceFiat.description: Total balance in fiat currency for all token holdings. Decimal string without exponent notation or thousand separators.

totalPositionsBalanceFiat.description: Total balance in fiat currency for all app positions. Decimal string without exponent notation or thousand separators.

executionDateGte.description: Execution date greater than or equal to (ISO date string)

executionDateLte.description: Execution date less than or equal to (ISO date string)

limit.description: Maximum number of transactions to export

offset.description: Number of transactions to start from

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the job was created

Operation.description: Operation type: 0 for CALL, 1 for DELEGATE

operation.description: Operation type: 0 for CALL, 1 for DELEGATE

value.description: Parameter value - typically a string, but may be an array of strings for array types (e.g., address[], uint256[])

operation.description: Operation type: 0 for CALL, 1 for DELEGATE

signerAddress.description:
Optional signer address filter:
 Omitted (undefined): Deletes subscriptions regardless of signer address
 null: Deletes only subscriptions with no signer address
 Valid address: Deletes only subscriptions with that specific signer address

subscriptions.description: At least one subscription is required

alias.description: The new alias for the member

gasLimit.description: If specified, a gas buffer of 150k will be added on top of the expected gas usage for the transaction. This is for the Gelato Relay execution overhead, reducing the chance of the task cancelling before it is executed on-chain.

severity.description: Severity level indicating the importance and risk

description.description: Detailed description explaining the finding and its implications

data.description: Hex-encoded data payload for the transaction.

data.description: EIP-712 typed data to analyze for security threats. Contains domain, primaryType, types, and message fields following the EIP-712 standard for structured data signing.

address.description: Address involved in the issue, if applicable

severity.description: Severity level indicating the importance and risk

description.description: Detailed description explaining the finding and its implications

issues.description: A partial record of specific issues identified during threat analysis, grouped by severity.Record<Severity, ThreatIssue[]> - keys should be one of the Severity enum (OK | INFO | WARN | CRITICAL)

THREAT.description: Array of threat analysis results. Results are sorted by severity (CRITICAL first). May include malicious patterns, ownership changes, module changes, or master copy upgrades.

example.title: No threats detected

success.description: Whether the report was submitted successfully
